rooms.description: Spacious entrance lobby with a wheelchair accessible design featuring smooth transitions and tactile floor indicators.

Open-plan living area combined with dining space and open kitchen, designed in Scandinavian style with minimalistic furniture and neutral color palette. Floor-to-ceiling windows provide abundant natural light while adhering to Vastu principles by positioning them on the east or north side for optimal energy flow.
Luxurious master bedroom with private balcony and en-suite bathroom. Designed with Scandinavian aesthetics and ample storage space, ensuring ease of mobility for wheelchair users.
Spacious guest bedroom designed to accommodate visitors comfortably, featuring built-in wardrobes and accessible features such as lowered counters and wide doorways.
Modern study area with ergonomic workspace designed for comfort. Includes adjustable desk and chair arrangements to suit wheelchair accessibility.
Wheelchair accessible bathroom designed for safety with grab bars, non-slip tiles, and appropriate fixtures.

openings.description: Wheelchair-accessible main entrance with automatic door system.
Floor-to-ceiling windows providing abundant natural light and enhancing the open-plan design. Windows are placed in accordance with Vastu principles to ensure positive energy flow.
Access to a private balcony designed for wheelchair access, ensuring connectivity with outdoor spaces.
